com.skobbler.ngx.routing
Class SKRouteSettings

java.lang.Object
  com.skobbler.ngx.routing.SKRouteSettings

public class SKRouteSettings
extends java.lang.Object

The SKRoute is used to store information about a requested route. This is used just as an input parameter for making a route.

Version:
2.5

getRouteCorridorWidthInMeters

public int getRouteCorridorWidthInMeters()
Returns:
Returns the route corridor width. This is half of the routes corrdidors width. The corridor will have routeCorridorWidthInMeters on both sides of the route.

setRouteCorridorWidthInMeters

public void setRouteCorridorWidthInMeters(int routeCorridorWidthInMeters)
Sets the route corridor width. This is half of the routes corrdidors width. The corridor will have routeCorridorWidthInMeters on both sides of the route.

Parameters:
routeCorridorWidthInMeters -

isWaitForCorridorDownload

public boolean isWaitForCorridorDownload()
Returns:
Indicates whether to wait for the corridor download before signaling the route calculation. Using this boolean, assures that the entire corridor is available on device before signaling the route calculation.

setWaitForCorridorDownload

public void setWaitForCorridorDownload(boolean waitForCorridorDownload)
Sets a boolean that indicates whether to wait for the corridor download before signaling the route calculation. Using this boolean, assures that the entire corridor is available on device before signaling the route calculation.

Parameters:
waitForCorridorDownload -

getDestinationIsPoint

public boolean getDestinationIsPoint()
Returns:
Indicates whether the destination is a specific point ( POI, street with house number, etc ) or not ( a street, a city ). This affects advice for reaching the destination.

setDestinationIsPoint

public void setDestinationIsPoint(boolean destinationIsPoint)
Sets a boolean that indicates whether the destination is a specific point ( POI, street with house number, etc ) or not ( a street, a city ). This affects advice for reaching the destination.

Parameters:
destinationIsPoint -

isRequestAdvices

public boolean isRequestAdvices()
Returns if it was set to request the list of advice for the route.

Returns:
true if it was set to request the list of advice for the route, false otherwise.

setRequestAdvices

public void setRequestAdvices(boolean requestAdvices)
Sets whether to request the list of advice when making the route. If set to true, the route can be used for turn by turn navigation and SKRouteManager.getAdviceList(int, com.skobbler.ngx.SKMaps.SKDistanceUnitType) will return valid advices. Default is true.

Parameters:
requestAdvices -

list of via points

Sets the via points for the route

Parameters:
viaPoints - viaPoints for the route

isRouteExposed

public boolean isRouteExposed()
Returns a boolean that indicates whether the route should be rendered. In some cases we just need information about a route (e.g. route distance), and we don't need the route to be rendered on the map.

Returns:
a boolean that indicates whether the route should be rendered.

setRouteExposed

public void setRouteExposed(boolean exposeRoute)
Sets a boolean that indicates whether the route should be rendered. In some cases we just need information about a route (e.g. route distance), and we don't need the route to be rendered on the map.

Parameters:
exposeRoute -

isFilterAlternatives

public boolean isFilterAlternatives()
Returns a boolean that indicates whether to filter/remove the alternatives that are too similar with the previous calculated ones. Currently routes that are less then 10% different are considered too similar. In order to not be filtered a route has to be >=10% different compared with all previously calculated routes. Taken into account only when routeModesForAlternates is set.

Returns:
a boolean that indicates whether to filter/remove the alternatives that are too similar with the previous calculated ones.

setFilterAlternatives

public void setFilterAlternatives(boolean filterAlternatives)
Sets a boolean that indicates whether to filter/remove the alternatives that are too similar with the previous calculated ones. Currently routes that are less then 10% different are considered too similar. In order to not be filtered a route has to be >=10% different compared with all previously calculated routes. Taken into account only when routeModesForAlternates is set.

Parameters:
filterAlternatives -
